Text: After a long trial in Britain, David Irving was called A LIAR by the presiding judge as many examples of his lies were shown in court, only neo-nazi turds promote him because he's like them, LIARS all, to spread hate and lies.

Ya know.., I find it quite amazing at times.., how some people are so "biased" in their thoughts.., that they seem to have an attitude that virtually says:  "I've already got my mind made-up.., so PLEASE don't confuse me with the facts" !!

Sooo.., to that end.., maybe.., JUST maybe.., people (of ALL ethnic backgrounds !!) should be allowed to at least listen to the "other side of the story".., and THEN make up their own minds (through the deduction of "sheer logic") as to what reveals itself as truth.., VERSUS what is just a "cover-up" of the truth.., without having to be subjected to those who resort to just NASTY types of "name-calling"...

Now there's an idea.., who's time should by all "rights" be allowed.., and NOT suppressed...

Yes / No ???

The fact you're allowed to spread Irving's lies here is the one side, my warning to those who don't know Irving for what he has BEEN PROVEN IN COURT to be, is the other. Viewers search in google and find out more.
